TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CircleEase extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase

summary.span: 表示緩動函式，這個函式會利用循環函式來建立加速和 (或) 減速的動畫。

span.span: Represents an easing function that creates an animation that accelerates and/or decelerates using a circular function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以控制是否動畫加速、 減速，或兩者皆指定。You can control whether the animation accelerates, decelerates, or both by specifying the . 下圖示範不同的值，其中*f*(*t*) 代表動畫進度並*t*代表時間。The following graph demonstrates the different values of , where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time. ![CircleEase EasingMode 圖形。] (~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode 圖形。")![CircleEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode graphs.") 此函式所使用的公式如下所示。The formula used for this function is the following. ![CircleEase 的數學公式](~/add/media/circleease-formula.png "CircleEase 的數學公式")![Mathematical formula for CircleEase](~/add/media/circleease-formula.png "Mathematical formula for CircleEase") 有效值*t*是-1 < = *t* < = 1。The valid values for *t* are -1 <= *t* <= 1. 值大於 1 會評估為 1，以及值小於-1 會評估為-1。Values greater than 1 are evaluated as 1, and values less than -1 are evaluated as -1. 這表示以外的值在此時間間隔，動畫會繼續，但 easing 函式會暫停，當進入無效的網域，而且它會繼續將會使無效的網域之後。This means that for values outside this interval, the animation continues, but the easing function pauses when it enters the invalid domain, and it resumes after it leaves the invalid domain. 有數個其他 easing 函式除了。There are several other easing functions besides . 除了使用包含在執行階段的 easing 函式，您可以建立您自己自訂的 easing 函式，藉由繼承自。In addition to using the easing functions included in the run-time, you can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from . ## XAML 物件項目用法XAML Object Element Usage ```xaml ``` ## Examples 下列範例會套用easing 函式以建立 decelerating 動畫。The following example applies a easing function to a to create a decelerating animation. [!code-xaml[CircleEase#CircleEase](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/circleease/CS/window1.xaml#circleease)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

abstract member CreateInstanceCore : unit -> System.Windows.Freezable override this.CreateInstanceCore : unit -> System.Windows.Freezable

summary.span: 建立 衍生類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the derived class.

summary.span: 建立衍生類別時，您必須覆寫這個方法。

span.span: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 動畫類別間接繼承自。Animation classes inherit indirectly from . 基於這個原因，您需要覆寫方法來建構自訂動畫物件。Because of this, you need to override the method to construct a custom animation object. ## Examples 下列範例示範的典型實作。The following example shows a typical implementation of . [!code-csharp[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/CSharp/freezablesample.cs#createinstancecoreexample)] [!code-vb[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/visualbasic/freezablesample.vb#createinstancecoreexample)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance float64 EaseInCore(float64 normalizedTime) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function EaseInCore (normalizedTime As Double) As Double

param.name: normalizedTime
param.span: 動畫的標準化時間 (進度)。

summary.span: 提供 easing 函式的邏輯部分，您可將其覆寫以產生自訂 easing 函式的 模式。

span.span: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the mode of the custom easing function.

returns.span: 表示已轉換進度的雙精度浮點數。

span.span: A double that represents the transformed progress.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法轉換標準化的時間，以控制動畫的步調案例。This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the case of . 您只需要指定 easing 函式情況下，因為實作方法轉換`normalizedTime`如和案例。You only have to specify your easing function for the case because the implementation of the method transforms `normalizedTime` for the and cases.
